message:
There are more than 700 million users on Instagram. 52% of teens are using Instagram.
What are the odds of a sex trafficker or child predator using Instagram to message your teen?

data.description: With 52% of teen using Instagram, it’s safe to say that a lot of parents are teaching their children Instagram safety. Learn how keeping communication open is better than any monitoring app, how to…
data.title: How to Discuss Instagram Safety with Students
